otp.SUBJECT: Log in with your one time password!
otp.HEADING: Log in with your one time password!
otp.BODY: You can find your one time password below - use it on the website to log in.
otp.DID_NOT_REQUEST: If you did not try to log in, you dont need to do anything - You can safely ignore this email.

contactRequestConfirmation.SUBJECT: We have recieved your message!
contactRequestConfirmation.PREVIEW: We will reply as soon as possible!
contactRequestConfirmation.HEADING: We have recieved your message!
contactRequestConfirmation.BODY: Thank you for contacting us. We will process your message as fast as possible.
contactRequestConfirmation.YOUR_MESSAGE: This is what you sent us:
contactRequestConfirmation.DID_NOT_REQUEST: If you did not do this yourself, you can safely ignore this email and its replies.

contactRequestNotification.SUBJECT: Niew contactverzoek
contactRequestNotification.PREVIEW: We hebben een nieuw contactverzoek gekregen
contactRequestNotification.HEADING: We hebben een bericht ontvangen.
contactRequestNotification.BODY: heeft op de website een bericht achtergelaten.
contactRequestNotification.THEIR_MESSAGE: Dit is wat ze naar ons stuurde:
contactRequestNotification.REPLY: Klik hier om het bericht te beantwoorden.
